Georgia head coach Joni Taylor hudles up her team after getting a win in a NCAA college basketball game between Georgia and Seton Hall Sunday Dec PERIOD   in Athens Ga PERIOD PhotoJoshua L PERIOD Jones joshjonesphotoyahoo.com

Georgia head coach Joni Taylor and the womens basketball team received recognition from the NCAA for their Beyond Basketball initiative in the December Creative Challenge as a wild card winner PERIOD

Beyond Basketball is a community of empowered women whose mission is to better each other both personally and professionally PERIOD Moreover its intentions are to educate support and connect women of different ages and ethnicities in efforts to establish an environment for members to thrive and go beyond expectations PERIOD

Ive always wanted to have or be a part of an organization of likeminded powerful women of all ethnicities and backgrounds that comes together to share network get challenged and recharge their batteries Taylor said PERIOD

Taylor updates the allfemale members about her team in addition to having guest speakers come in and talk about life outside basketball PERIOD The meeting takes place monthly and allows members at the end of each meeting to have the opportunity to promote a potential cause or event where they may require support PERIOD

The purpose of the Creative Challenge which was created in the fall of  is to commend womens basketball programs for their efforts in generating various ways to expand their fan bases through means of community outreach PERIOD

Coach Taylor and I both share a passion to grow the game of womens basketball assistant director of promotions Gina Gonzales said PERIOD We both understand how vital it is to connect with the community on and off the court to develop deeper relationships with our fan base. expectations were high for the Georgia Lady Bulldogs basketball team coming into the start of Southeastern Conference play PERIOD Georgia began the season hot going  in nonconference games with an average point differential of  points PERIOD The run included an undefeated month of December highlighted by a  victory over the then No PERIOD  Seton Hall PERIOD

Former Lady Bulldog basketball head coach Andy Landers has been named to the Southeastern Conference Class of Womens Legends PERIOD The honorees include one former studentathlete coach or administrator from each of the  SEC schools PERIOD
